name: Engineer

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
text: The gnome has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma saving throws against magic.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: The gnome is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence. It has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mending, prestidigitation
â€¢ 1st level (2 slots): burning hands, disguise self, shield

action.name: Dagger
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

spells: fire bolt, mending, prestidigitation, burning hands, disguise self, shield
description:
An engineer who maintains and operates the Scarlet Marpenoth, a submarine, currently attached below Jarlaxle's flagship the Eyecatcher
Source: Waterdeep: Dragon Heist p. 141
